pageContext.claim: “We have 8,000 military personnel right now at the border.”
pageContext.analysis: There were about 6,000 active-duty troops and national guard deployed at the border. “I’d say 30 or 40 percent of them will be departing in the next month or so when they complete some of their work, and I believe we'll probably draw down to between 3,000 and 4,000,” said Acting Defense Secretary Patrick Shanahan on March 14.
